subject: p13352405
History: Status post right thoracotomy and decortication, assessment for interval change.
Findings: As compared to the previous radiograph, the new right basal pneumothorax, located at the site of the tube insertions, is no longer visible. The pleural space appears to be filled with a small amount of fluid. The position of the three right chest tubes is constant. Markedly increasing is the cervical and right pleural soft tissue air collection. Unchanged appearance of the left lung and of the cardiac silhouette.
